functionParameters.name: Item_Id_Z
functionParameters.comment: Para acharmos o item no array do seu tipo

parameters.text: "IID: " & counter

children.text: Verifica se a arma nÃ£o foi desbloqueada

parameters.text: A_Weapons.At( 1, 1, counter ) & newline & "LVL " & Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter ) & " > " & Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter )+1

"Materials: " & tokenat( A_Weapons.At(6, 1, counter), 1, "_")  & " [icon=" & tokenat ( A_Weapons.At(6, 1, counter), 0, "_") & "] / " & tokenat( A_Weapons.At(7, 1, counter), 1, "_")  & " [icon=" & tokenat ( A_Weapons.At(7, 1, counter), 0, "_") & "]"
"Materials: " & tokenat( A_Weapons.At(6, 1, counter), 1, "_")  & " [icon=" & tokenat ( A_Weapons.At(6, 1, counter), 0, "_") & "]"

"Dmg: " & A_Weapons.At( 2, 1, counter ) & " | " & "P. Dmg: " & A_Weapons.At( 3, 1, counter ) & newline & "Ammo: " & A_Weapons.At( 4, 1, counter ) & newline & "Special: " & A_Weapons.At( 5, 1, counter )
"Dmg: " & A_Weapons.At( 2, 1, counter ) & " | " & "P. Dmg: " & A_Weapons.At( 3, 1, counter ) & newline & newline & "Special: " & A_Weapons.At( 5, 1, counter )

"Dmg: " & A_Weapons.At( 2, 1, counter ) & newline & newline & "Special: " & A_Weapons.At( 5, 1, counter )
A_Weapons.At( 1, 1, counter ) & newline & "LVL " & Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter ) & " > " & Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter )+1

"Materials: " & tokenat( A_Weapons.At(6, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter)+1, counter), 1, "_")  & " [icon=" & tokenat ( A_Weapons.At(6, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter)+1, counter), 0, "_") & "] / " & tokenat( A_Weapons.At(7, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter)+1, counter)+1, 1, "_")  & " [icon=" & tokenat ( A_Weapons.At(7, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter)+1, counter), 0, "_") & "]"

"Materials: " & tokenat( A_Weapons.At(6, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter)+1, counter), 1, "_")  & " [icon=" & tokenat ( A_Weapons.At(6, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter)+1, counter), 0, "_") & "]"

"Dmg: " & A_Weapons.At( 2, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter ), counter ) & " > " & A_Weapons.At( 2, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter )+1, counter ) & " | " & "P. Dmg: " & A_Weapons.At( 3, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter ), counter ) & " > " & A_Weapons.At( 3, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter )+1, counter ) & newline & "Ammo: " & A_Weapons.At( 4, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter ), counter ) & " > " & A_Weapons.At( 4, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter )+1, counter )  & newline & "Special: " & A_Weapons.At( 5, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter )+1, counter )

"Dmg: " & A_Weapons.At( 2, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter ), counter ) & " > " & A_Weapons.At( 2, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter )+1, counter ) & " | " & "P. Dmg: " & A_Weapons.At( 3, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter ), counter ) & " > " & A_Weapons.At( 3, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter )+1, counter ) & newline & newline & "Special: " & A_Weapons.At( 5, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter )+1, counter )

"Dmg: " & A_Weapons.At( 2, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter ), counter ) & " > " & A_Weapons.At( 2, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter )+1, counter ) & newline & "Ammo: " & A_Weapons.At( 4, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter ), counter ) & " > " & A_Weapons.At( 4, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter )+1, counter )  & newline & "Special: " & A_Weapons.At( 5, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter )+1, counter )

"Dmg: " & A_Weapons.At( 2, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter ), counter ) & " > " & A_Weapons.At( 2, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter) + 1, counter ) & newline & newline & "Special: " & A_Weapons.At( 5, Dict_Save_File.Get( "WP_" & counter )+1, counter )
